insert:
insert into course (id, course, location, teacher, week_day, week_string, section_length, section_start, section_end, week) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{course,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sectionEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
